Documentation Updates

Below are documentation updates for October-December 2024.

Index of all documentation updates

20-Dec-2024

New Docs

  • Title: Packaged Plugins
  • Description: In this topic, we introduced Packaged Plugins with Brightcove Player version 7.21.0, a new way to manage core player features. This replaces the Plugin Registry.
  • Link: https://apis.support.brightcove.com/player-management/guides/packaged-plugin.html
  • Category:
  • Title: Stripe Purchase
  • Description: In this topic, you will learn how to facilitate payments in Brightcove Beacon
  • Link: https://beacon-help.support.brightcove.com/monetization/general/stripe-purchase.html
  • Category:
  • Title: Android SDK v10 Migration Guide
  • Description: In this topic, you will learn about Brightcove Android SDK has been migrated from the ExoPlayer library (v2.19.1) to the Media3 library (v1.4.1)
  • Link: https://sdks.support.brightcove.com/android/basics/bc-android-sdk-migration.html
  • Category:

Major updates

  • Title: Publisher Insights: Engagement
  • Description: Update new parameters
  • Link: https://studio.support.brightcove.com/analytics/pi-engagement.html
  • Category:
  • Title: Publisher Insights: Content
  • Description: Update new parameters
  • Link: https://studio.support.brightcove.com/analytics/pi-content.html
  • Category:

Minor updates

  • Title: Creating Social Media Publishing Destinations
  • Description: X reference update
  • Link: https://studio.support.brightcove.com/social/module/creating-social-media-publishing-destinations.html
  • Category:

  • Description: The Engagement dashboard for Marketing Insights delivers essential metrics that offer a clear view of how viewers interact with video content over time.
  • Link: https://studio.support.brightcove.com/analytics/marketing-engagement.html
  • Category:
  • Title: Marketing Insights: Content
  • Description: The Content dashboard was designed to understand audience engagement, and optimize content based on key metrics.
  • Link: https://studio.support.brightcove.com/analytics/marketing-content.html
  • Category:
  • Title: Marketing Insights: Segments
  • Description: The Segments section allows you to define and monitor the performance and status of each segment based on user behaviors and content interaction.
  • Link: https://studio.support.brightcove.com/analytics/marketing-segments.html
  • Category:
  • Title: Marketing Insights: Quick Reports
  • Description: Quick Reports offers a streamlined way to generate and access predefined reports for key data insights.
  • Link: https://studio.support.brightcove.com/analytics/marketing-quick-reports.html
